text:
you	have	difficulty	cutting	
down what you drink, talk 
to your doctor, midwife, 
pharmacist or other 
healthcare professional. 
Confidential	help	and	support	
is available from local 
counselling services. Visit 
www.drugsandalcoholni.info 
for more information.
You should talk to your midwife 
if you have any concerns about 
your drinking around the time of 
conception and early pregnancy. 
You can get more advice from 
pha.site/alcohol-pregnancy
A directory of services 
is available at www.
